review: this is still the best lego game ive played episodes i ii and iii feel quicker than iv v and vi i think thats because these were originally 2 separate games and lego star wars 1 was the first time they were trying something like this completing this is a bit long but it feels very satisfying there is also a great reward for doing so my favorite level was probably the final level in episode iii and my least favorite has to be the original gunship cavalry
